_header: A king out of the North shall come

BodTan88.First Lines:
A prince out of the North shall comeKinge borne crownd babe his
                    brest vpon…
BodTan88.Last Lines:
…duringe which time he is in one howerof East and West crownd
                    emperowr…
BodTan88.Note:
Written by a hand of the seventeenth century; ends imperfectly because
                    bottom of folio cropped; a seventeenth-century transcript is London,  British Library Harley 7332, f. 28
